mapper.select: SELECT CATEGORY_NAME as categoryName FROM CATEGORY

SELECT (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(cash_price),0) FROM cash WHERE member_id=#{memberId} AND cash_kind='수입' AND cash_date=#{cashDate}) - (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(cash_price),0) FROM cash WHERE member_id=#{memberId} AND cash_kind='지출' AND cash_date=#{cashDate}) FROM dual;

SELECT cash_no as cashNo, cash_kind as cashKind, category_name as categoryName, cash_price as cashPrice, cash_place as cashPlace, cash_memo as cashMemo from cash where member_id = #{memberId} AND cash_date = #{cashDate} ORDER BY cash_no ASC
